attributes.action: ensure a mini golf course is included in the plans for 'Vision for Newbury'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a lack of mini golf courses in the county of Berkshire and surrounding areas. We would like a mini golf course to be built in the recreational area of Newbury as part of the 'Vision for Newbury' project for familes and friends to enjoy.
